title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-4.2 - Laboratory certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-4.2 - Laboratory certification

State Regulations

The laboratory used for air sample or bulk sample
analysis shall be one approved by the New York State Department of Health

Environmental Laboratory Approval Program (NYSDOH ELAP) for the selected
asbestos analysis methodology. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-4.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
